title: Ozark National Scenic Riverways: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       "In spite of the durability of rock-walled canyons and the surging power of cataracting water, the wild river is a fragile thing-the most fragile portion of the wilderness country. "- (John Craighead, Biologist and one of the architects of the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act)        The Ozark hellbender has recently been listed as a Federally Endangered species.    NEWS RELEASES ARCHIVE Contact our Public Information Officer, Dena Matteson. 573-323-8028 or e-mail.
